title: 100 years of climate change : project development and trial.
abstract: Taking you on a night-time journey, 100 Years Of Climate Change is an audio walk involving a hypnotic induction to open up awareness of the urban environment. The inspiration was that we might experience 100 years of climate change by taking a short walk of 100 metres
